# AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Alert

**Structure**

A value that indicates the current state of an alarm.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Alert
```

## Creating an alert

- **init(time:)**: Creates an instance of an alert.
- **time**: The time that the alarm emits an alert.

## Creating an alert

- **AlarmPresentationState.Mode.alert(_:)**: A mode indicating an alarm emits an alert.
